scripts.install: if [ -e build-template ]; then mv build-template BUILD.bazel && yarnpkg upgrade react@^17.0.2 react-dom@^17.0.2 && npx yarn-deduplicate --strategy fewer ; fi
scripts.test-ci: tsc --noEmit && eslint --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --max-warnings 0 src && CI=true react-scripts test --watchman false --haste '{"enableSymlinks": true}'
scripts.deploy:
if command -v static-sites >/dev/null 2>&1; then yarnpkg build && static-sites publish --sandbox --serve-missing-directories react-app dist; else printf >&2 '
Please install the static-sites CLI in MDE: MDE Preferences... > eng > optional > static_sites

' && exit 1; fi
